possible_violations.legal_basis: Fundamental Rights or international protection obligations

records.context_note: Last night (12/13.05.2017 the exact time is not confirmed) in [redacted] 01 [redacted] UAM (year old) was rapped by an adult [redacted] migrant. As initially reported there were 3 [redacted] adults involved in the incident (2 of them bound minor's hands and the third one rapped the UAM). The 3 [redacted] alleged perpetrators have been apprehended and transferred to the HP Station in Kos. The UAM is going to be examined by doctors and receive adequate medical and psychological assistance.
records.evidence_quote: Sexual abuse of unaccompanied minor... UAM (year old) was rapped by an adult migrant.
